description:
Actress Sydney Sweeney, known for her breakout roles in Euphoria and Anyone But You, has taken on a fresh role in the world of advertising. Teaming up with Dr. Squatch, a popular men’s grooming brand known for its all-natural products and quirky marketing, Sydney Sweeney is now the star of the brand’s latest campaign, playing [...]

The post Sydney Sweeney Leads New Dr. Squatch Body Wash Campaign appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Sydney Sweeney Leads New Dr. Squatch Body Wash Campaign
